33ed8c96b2b06385e426e5bcf6935cf8 (06:01): +I think Roland is making the entire world new again with the ksh93 project
72bac19ca0a2ff15f99326a8f7e02c10 (06:01): +If he can get perfect compatibility with nearly-ksh88, more power to him.
72bac19ca0a2ff15f99326a8f7e02c10 (06:01): +I'll believe it when I see it, however. :)
d151ca693f617f47c68797c351f1495e (06:02): +I suppose I should say something else after that, so it's not the last thing that shows up when he logs in and asks drone what I said last... 8-)
